desc: The Green Jeweler grew from the joy of making jewelry and my passion for protecting the earth's resources. Here sustainability isn't a trend- we’ve created with reclaimed metals for 30 years. Each setting is designed, fabricated, soldered, fused and gemstones set by hand at our studio in Coos Bay, Oregon.

layout.text: Hand Crafted with Love in Oregon

Jewelry crafted from Recycled Gold, Silver and Fair Mined Gemstones
Free shipping on orders over 50
